name: Industry Mania
description:
Industry Mania is a casual and time management video game. This game utilizes a point-and-click arcade gameplay model that enables the player to manage the production processes on a workplace using a mouse. In this game you can recruit workers, give workers salaries, manage energy resources, operate factories, collect products, sell products, and make even more cash.

You have to complete the task within the given time to beat the levels and then unlock new workers and factories. These business fields consist of: forestry, mining, fisheries, animal husbandry, food, chemicals, machinery, and aircraft.

Industry Mania game features:
• 22 levels to beat
• Four workers to pay for
• Eight factories to run
• Eight industrial products to sell
• Relaxing background music
